short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculates opacity in hexidecimal format and can be copied to the clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Calculates opacity in hexidecimal format and can be copied to the clipboard.

In a later version, you will be able to calculate a new hexidecimal color with an initial background color and opacity.
